title: Add animated gaming background to queue and social media links

requirements.text: Generate a custom animated video background that resembles dynamic gameplay footage for the login queue screen

quotes: Generate a custom animated video back ground
I'll generate a custom animated video background for the queue screen that looks like dynamic gameplay footage

acceptanceCriteria: Video background displays animated gaming-style visuals behind the queue countdown
Animation loops seamlessly without disrupting the queue UI elements
Video is optimized for web performance

requirements.text: Add YouTube and Instagram social media icons at the bottom of the LoginQueue component, with YouTube linking to https://youtube.com/@fros7yyt?si=u4-j8LrTkNuj7wUo and Instagram URL configurable by admin

quotes: Make them the bottom of the queue and at the bottom of the store

acceptanceCriteria: YouTube and Instagram icons appear at the bottom of the queue screen
Instagram icon links to a URL that can be configured
Icons are styled consistently with the gaming theme
Links open in a new tab

requirements.text: Add YouTube and Instagram social media icons at the bottom of the storefront page, with YouTube linking to https://youtube.com/@fros7yyt?si=u4-j8LrTkNuj7wUo and Instagram URL configurable by admin

quotes: Make them the bottom of the queue and at the bottom of the store

acceptanceCriteria: YouTube and Instagram icons appear at the bottom of the store page
Instagram icon links to a URL that can be configured
Icons are styled consistently with the gaming theme
Links open in a new tab

requirements.text: Add Instagram URL field to the payment configuration section in the admin panel so admins can configure the Instagram link displayed on the queue and store pages

quotes: I'll also add an Instagram URL field so you can configure that in the admin panel

acceptanceCriteria: Instagram URL field appears in the PaymentConfigForm alongside other payment settings
Admins can input and update the Instagram URL
Instagram URL is stored in the backend
Instagram icon on queue and store pages uses the configured URL
Form validates that the Instagram URL is a valid URL format

nonGoals: Changing the queue countdown logic or timing behavior
Adding other social media platforms beyond YouTube and Instagram
Modifying the existing payment configuration fields

required: Animated gaming background video showing dynamic gameplay footage with fast-paced action, vibrant colors, and looping seamlessly (gaming-background.mp4)
